TopicTitle: New Kerbalnaut eager to try Everything!

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone!

It's day two of playing with KSP for me, and so far I have launched 1 satellite ,2 manned missions, 2 deep space probes, put a satellite in munar orbit, and am about to try my first docking experiment.

I really can't wait to make so many super Kerbaltastic things, the only problem with KSP is, I just can't decide what to do first... I don't know if I want a space station or if I want to taste that sweet Mun cheese first! I saw some of the creations on the big picture thread and looks like there's really no limit to what creations I can make! I think this may turn out to be the best game ever!

Wallace

Welcome, Wallace

Indeed KSP has almost no limits... Yet just imagine players, who start playing the game few months later... when we have resource gathering, asteroid belt, another (perhaps further away in the Kerbol system) gas giant with it's moons, proper campain mode, more EVA stuff to do and so on and so on... I mean, it's gonna be even "worse" for a new player what to focus on )

Anyways, many (un)safe launchings and have fun with our community

Best regards...

Live to rocket, rocket to live!

Best of luck in your future en devours.

With nitroglycerin,

Keyofdoor.

Hooray! Thanks for the warm welcome everyone

I decided to go with making a space station first

most of the things docked are just junk orbital tugs and attaching the accommodation module was a near-disaster, especially as a couple of kerbals snook back into a lander can part after I'd kicked them out, luckily an improvised and almost even more disastrous rescue was staged and I think the station will shape up nicely.
